channel.title: Zar Amir Ebrahimi on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Zar Amir Ebrahimi on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: ‘In the Land of Arto’: Camille Cottin, Zar Amir Ebrahimi Journey Into Armenia and Its Past (Exclusive Clips)
item.description: Tamara Stepanyan’s drama, a French-Armenian co-production, which will open the 78th edition of the Locarno Film Festival, asks such questions as: “Can the dead be saved?”
